pre_1.name: Qt4 Pre-Update Removal
pre_1.info: If updating from an 18.12 version: The Qt4 packages are causing `pkg` to crash due to being removed upstream.

pre_2.name: [CRITICAL] Sysup Updater Bootstrap
pre_2.info: If updating from 19.05 or older: The new version of sysup needs to be forcibly installed before starting the update. Failure to do so will render the new boot environment unusable.

pre_2.name: [CRITICAL] Sysup Updater Bootstrap
